Title: M-5 B-17 AREA SPRAY FIRE
Description: B-17 Area Spray Fire (Optional). Roll one die per fighter attacked normally.

notes: Roll on Table M-2 for damage
Roll on Table M-2 for damage
Gun is jammed and cannot fire for remainder of mission unless repaired
Gun is jammed and cannot fire for remainder of mission unless repaired
Area Spray Fire represents the 'hosing' of an area with a long burst of an unaimed spray of bullets.
Mark off three bursts of ammunition for each gun position that sprays.
When the spraying gun fires, resolve its fire on Table M-5 instead of Table M-1.
Area Spray Fire may not be used against any 10:30, 12, 1:30, or Vertical Dive attacks.
It may be used against any 3, 6, 9, or Vertical Climb attacks.
Ace Gunners employing Area Spray Fire do not add 1 to their die roll.

Jammed guns may be repaired during turns when no fighter waves appear by having a crew member spend the turn working on the gun. Roll 1D: 1-4 = Gun repaired; 5-6 = Still jammed, try again next opportunity.
